column1: How can I contact Taste of India?
column2: You can contact Taste of India via our support number at +91-9876543210 or email us at support@tasteofindia.com.

column1: What is the customer support number?
column2: Our customer support number is +91-9876543210. Feel free to call us for any queries.

column1: Give me the email for customer service.
column2: For customer service inquiries, please email us at support@tasteofindia.com.

column1: How do I connect to live chat?
column2: You can connect to our live chat by visiting our website and clicking on the 'Chat with Us' button.

column1: Is there any way to talk to an agent?
column2: Yes, you can talk to a live agent via our support number or live chat on our website.

column1: Can I visit your restaurant offline?
column2: Taste of India is a cloud kitchen, so we do not have a physical restaurant for offline visits. You can explore our menu online.

column1: Where is Taste of India located?
column2: We operate online as a cloud kitchen, serving authentic regional food across different locations.

column1: Can I pick up my order from your kitchen?
column2: Currently, we do not offer order pickups. We only deliver directly to your doorstep.

column1: Do you have a physical store?
column2: Taste of India is an online cloud kitchen. We do not have a physical store for dine-in.

column1: What are your customer support hours?
column2: Our customer support is available from 9 AM to 11 PM IST.

column1: How do I report an issue with my order?
column2: To report an issue with your order, please call +91-9876543210 or email support@tasteofindia.com.

column1: I have a complaint, where should I contact?
column2: For complaints, you can reach out to us at support@tasteofindia.com or call our helpline.

column1: How do I track my order?
column2: You can track your order through our website or app under the 'Track Order' section.

column1: Can I modify my order after placing it?
column2: Order modifications depend on preparation status. Contact support as soon as possible for changes.

column1: How do I cancel my order?
column2: To cancel your order, please contact customer support within 10 minutes of placing the order.

column1: Do you have a refund policy?
column2: Yes, we have a refund policy. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

column1: How long does it take to process a refund?
column2: Refunds usually take 5-7 business days, depending on your payment method.

column1: What payment methods do you accept?
column2: We accept online payments via credit/debit cards, UPI, and mobile wallets.

column1: Is there a way to talk to a human agent?
column2: Yes, you can talk to a human agent by calling our support number or requesting a callback via chat.

column1: How do I check my order history?
column2: To check your order history, log in to your account and visit the 'My Orders' section.

column1: I forgot my account password, what should I do?
column2: If you forgot your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page to reset it.

column1: How do I delete my account?
column2: To delete your account, contact our support team for assistance.

column1: Can I change my delivery address after ordering?
column2: Delivery addresses cannot be changed after the order is dispatched. Contact support for urgent requests.

column1: How do I subscribe to offers and discounts?
column2: To subscribe to offers, visit our website and sign up for newsletters or enable notifications in the app.

column1: Do you offer any membership or loyalty programs?
column2: Yes, we offer a loyalty program with exclusive discounts. Check our website for details.

column1: How do I know if my area is serviceable?
column2: To check if we deliver to your area, enter your pin code on our website or app.

column1: Can I suggest a new dish to your menu?
column2: We appreciate feedback! Send us your dish suggestions via email at suggestions@tasteofindia.com.

column1: Is there a way to collaborate with Taste of India?
column2: For collaborations, email us at partnerships@tasteofindia.com with your proposal.

column1: I am a food blogger, how can I connect with you?
column2: Food bloggers can connect with us at marketing@tasteofindia.com for partnerships and reviews.

column1: How do I unsubscribe from promotional emails?
column2: To unsubscribe from promotional emails, click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of the email.
